sentences.en: From voting reform to CCTV, from Trident to the debates, there’s a perfect Orwell quotation, apposite, terse and oracular, just waiting to be plucked out and flourished.
sentences.cn: 从选举改革，到闭路监视电视，从战斗机到争论，总有一条完美的奥维尔谏言，适当，简洁，神谕似的，就在那边等着被拔找出来，接着繁华开去。

sentences.en: His sister went away ruminating on this oracular speech of his.
sentences.cn: 他的妹妹只得在这一席庄严的至理名言中,默默退出屋子.

sentences.en: It is an oracular rule and the objective that the economic freedom pursues as well.
sentences.cn: 这不仅是“道法自然”所引出的一种理想境界,也是经济自由所追求的目标.

sentences.en: They are like oracular messages, but witty - jaunty at times - and sometimes trembling on the edge of whimsy.
sentences.cn: 它们都像神谕, 但很机智,有时极其轻快,有时又濒于怪诞.

sentences.en: This is a form of IA, but may be too focused on systems that are oracular.
sentences.cn: 这是智能扩升的一种形式, 但人们过于关注建造近乎全能的决策系统,即单向的,程序—>用户,系统.

sentences.en: With this oracular sentence Ben was well satisfied.
sentences.cn: 对这神圣的裁决,本相当满意.

words.tran_cn: 神谕的；谜似的；玄妙深奥的

trans.tran_cn: 神谕的，（陈述）庄严的，难解的
